title: List of College of the Holy Cross alumni
data: President Emeritus of College of the Holy Cross and former President from 1970 to 1994 , noted for introducing co-education at the college in 1972 ; member of Religious Studies faculty
professor , mathematics , Boston University ; research interests include complex dynamical systems , chaos , fractals
Professor Emeritus at Catholic University Law School in Washington DC ; noted as a canon lawyer for his exposition of the Catholic Church 's view on abortion

professor , mathematics , University of North Carolina , Chapel Hill , NC ; research interests include ergodic theory , smooth dynamical systems , complex dynamics , and computer generated graphics images related to nonpolynomial dynamics
first African American to earn a Ph.D. and former President of Georgetown University
medievalist scholar ; expert on William Langland ; emeritus professor of English at Yale University
LSD -pioneering Harvard professor ; attended Holy Cross before transferring to West Point
professor of history at Georgetown University ; 2003 Charles Warren Fellow at Harvard University
President of Suffolk University in Boston
14th president of Saint Michael 's College , professor and author
intro: This list of College of the Holy Cross alumni includes graduates and non-graduate, former students at the College of the Holy Cross. Since its founding in 1843, Holy Cross has graduated 157 classes of students and as of the 2005-06 academic year had approximately 35,000 alumni.
